JNFP

Class JNFP

  • java.lang.Object
    • JNFP.JNFP

  • public class JNFP
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods for generating the NFP given two files and returns a string describing the NFP.
    Author:
    Stiaan Uyttersprot

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JNFP()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String GenerateMinkowskiNFP(java.io.File polyAFile, java.io.File polyBFile)
      Generate the NFP using the Minkowski sums method using a fixed round (1e-1)

      Generate the NFP using the Minkowski sums method using a fixed round (1e-1)

    • Method Detail

      • GenerateNFP

        public static java.lang.String GenerateNFP(java.io.File statPolyFile,
                                           java.io.File orbPolyFile)
                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Generate the NFP using the orbiting method using a fixed round (1e-4). This is the general method, the orbiting method provides the best results, so it is also used here.
        Parameters:
        statPolyFile - the stationary polygon file
        orbPolyFile - the orbiting polygon file
        Returns:
        the NFP in string form
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when the file is not found

      • GenerateOrbitingNFP

                                                   java.io.File orbPolyFile)
                                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Generate the NFP using the orbiting method using a fixed round (1e-4)
        Parameters:

        orbPolyFile - the orbiting polygon file
        Returns:
        the NFP in string form
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when the file is not found

        public static java.lang.String GenerateMinkowskiNFP(java.io.File polyAFile,
                                                    java.io.File polyBFile)
                                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Generate the NFP using the Minkowski sums method using a fixed round (1e-1)
        Parameters:

        polyBFile - polygon B
        Returns:
        the NFP in string form
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when the file is not found

      • GenerateNFP

        public static java.lang.String GenerateNFP(MultiPolygon statPoly,
                                           MultiPolygon orbPoly)
                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Generate the NFP using the orbiting method using a fixed round (1e-4). This is the general method, the orbiting method provides the best results, so it is also used here.
        Parameters:
        statPoly - the stationary polygon
        orbPoly - the orbiting polygon
        Returns:
        the NFP in string form
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when the file is not found
